project.description: A utility job to assemble build steps from builders of one or more freestyle projects

metadata-string.name: output-format
metadata-string.description: This is the data type of the output file. It can be one of the supported data types ( e.g., "tabular" ) or the format of the tool's input dataset ( e.g., format="input" ). It can also be an image type if the output is destined for visualization

metadata-string.name: metadata-source
metadata-string.description: This reads the metadata information from the tool's input dataset properties file(named with the extension.properties)

metadata-string.name: project-repository
metadata-string.description: Bitbucket repository for this project. example https://bitbucket.org/novartisnibr/qmic-job_name Clear if no repository

metadata-string.name: project-status
metadata-string.description: A status flag for the project.(test,demo,production,deprecated)

metadata-string.name: library
metadata-string.description: comma separated list of stat-engine libraries required for the job.

metadata-string.name: export-session
metadata-string.description: Options: true/false If the code supports it, it will export session data from the stat engine for debugging purposes

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WHAT_IS_THIS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: A utility job to assemble build steps from builders of one or more freestyle projects

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: HELPER_DB
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: [hidden] Identifier for the DB instance. Used to provide a common connection name across all project sql

secureScript.script: import org.kohsuke.stapler.Stapler def sessionID= Stapler.getCurrentRequest().getSession().getId() dbInstance= "${jenkinsProject.name}_$sessionID" as String return """ <input id="helperDb" name="value" type="text" class="setting-input " value="$dbInstance"> """

org.biouno.unochoice.ChoiceParameter.name: SOURCE_PROJECT
org.biouno.unochoice.ChoiceParameter.description: Select a Jenkins Project to reveal build steps that can be copied to the target project

secureScript.script:
import hudson.model.* jenkinsURL=jenkins.model.Jenkins.instance.getRootUrl() job=jenkins.model.Jenkins.instance.getJob(SOURCE_PROJECT) html="""
Review Build Form
Latest Configuration Analysis
""" return job.description +html

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: JSON_PARAM
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: [hidden] A JSON formatted parameter array used for interactive creation of artifacts

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: BUILD_STEPS
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: Select BUILD_STEPS that you would like to copy to the new Jenkins project

secureFallbackScript.script:
return "Error in BUILDSTEP_LIST script using SESSION_PARAMDB,SOURCEDATA,MANAGE
 $SESSION_PARAMDB,
$SOURCEDATA,
$MANAGE"

secureScript.script:
/* parameter_13_MANAGE_secureScript */ html='''
''' return html

/* ParamType:: AC-Reactive Reference Groovy Script Function: loads the helper javascript from the buildScripts project folder referencedParameters: NA */
env=System.getenv() helperJavaScriptPath="${env['JENKINS_HOME']}/jobs/${jenkinsProject.name}/buildScripts/helperJavaScript.js" helperJavaScript= new File(helperJavaScriptPath as String) return """ <script type="text/javascript"> ${helperJavaScript.text} //# sourceURL=helperJavaScipt.js </script>"""

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: TARGET_PROJECT
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: Name the project to be generated

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: APPEND_MODE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: In APPEND_MODE the selected build steps are appended to existing ones. Otherwise the NEW build steps overwrite the original ones

org.korosoft.jenkins.plugin.rtp.RichText.stableText:
Build steps copied from project(s) ${ENV:SOURCE_PROJECT} etc. Append Mode is ${ENV:APPEND_MODE}

Review builders using: JOB_BUILDSTEP_ASSEMBLER or run it ${ENV:TARGET_PROJECT}
